member.name: STRRET
member.summary: Contains strings returned from the interface methods.

summary.para: A value that specifies the desired format of the string. This can be one of the following values.
The string is returned in the cStr member.
The uOffset member value indicates the number of bytes from the beginning of the item identifier list where the string is located.
The string is at the address specified by pOleStr member.

member.name: STRRET.DUMMYUNIONNAME.pOleStr
member.summary: A pointer to the string. This memory must be allocated with . It is the calling application's responsibility to free this memory with when it is no longer needed.

member.name: STRRET.DUMMYUNIONNAME.uOffset
member.summary: The offset into the item identifier list.

member.name: STRRET.DUMMYUNIONNAME.cStr
member.summary: The buffer to receive the display name.
